Html:
Hi,

I tried to use PHPExcel to export xlsx file into HTML, everything goes well, but images missing.

I found that the src attribute of the img tag in the exported HTML is something like zip://./sampleData/example1.xlsx#xl/media/image1.png

Is there anyway to extract and save images separately onto hard disk of my server and override the src attribute with the correct value?

I have read this post,

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/discussions/286545

but I don't think I got what I want.

Thanks very much!
